# Logs\n\nApplication and test logs.\n\n## Contents\n\n- Test error logs: `test-errors-YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.log`\n- Worker logs (if redirected)\n- API logs (if redirected)\n\n## Log Rotation\n\nLogs are automatically generated with timestamps. Old logs can be cleaned:\n\n```bash\n# Remove logs older than 30 days\nfind logs/ -name "*.log" -mtime +30 -delete\n```\n\n## Git Ignore\n\nLog files are ignored by git (except `.gitkeep`).
